p: Measurement of free thyroxine (T4) concentration by equilibrium dialysis (fT4d) is technically demanding and expensive. An automated free T4 analogue (fT4a) immunoassay (Immulite 2000 Veterinary Free T4, Siemens) has recently gained popularity.
